title: Action Comics 23 (2013) (Tablet Edition)
description:
I adjusted the resolution and compression of the original scan for easier reading on tablets and to save space. All credit goes to the original scanner for their hard work. I have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.



Action Comics 23

By:   	Scott Lobdell, Philip Tan, Tyler Kirkham	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Superhero
Series:   	Action Comics
Publisher:   	DC Comics	
Pub. Date:  	August 07, 2013
Format:         CBZ

Superman battles the constructs of an immense alien civilization that has built a feudal system based on pure evil!

Plus, in the backup story, Jor-El and Lara try to save the Science Council from the colonel who seeks to make all of Krypton kneel before him!
